overview:
Vaughan is an Internet technologist and founder of VendHQ.com.

Vaughanâ€™s background is as a software architect and has worked on some fantastic and exciting projects, he has been involved with startups for quite some time, a director on boards, still writes code and keep his hands dirty and loves keeping abreast of new things and trends online.

Previously Vaughan was the CTO and architect of vianet.travel, providing a complete tool-set for tourism businesses and retailers to sell product online and globally, and architect of Trademe.co.nz’s (Trade Me is New Zealands largest website) www.travelbug.co.nz, which quickly grew to become the largest source of bookable accommodation in New Zealand, from backpackers to luxury hotels.

Other past projects include developing New Zealandâ€™s (and possibly the worldâ€™s) first tele-voting system, a mobile ordering system for one of the largest suppliers of dairy goods and their milkies, and mobile blog software, for mobile devices (a bit before itâ€™s time in 1999).
